content.prompt: What conclusion can be drawn from the graph?

choices.label: Both male students and female students showed an increase in helping behaviors after watching the video.
Only female students showed an increase in helping behaviors after watching the video.
Only male students showed an increase in helping behaviors after watching the video.
Both male students and female students showed a decrease in helping behaviors after watching the video.

topic.text: 3.9: Social, Cognitive, and Neurological Factors in Learning

skill.text: 3.C: Interpret quantitative or qualitative inferential data from a given table, graph, chart, figure, or diagram.
